Description: Green glazed composition scarab, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, pierced longitudinally, base decorated with six annules.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, pl. viii, 20.

This scarab seems to be a product of the Scarab Factory (on the production see Gorton 1996, 91-131). Gorton, A.F. 1996, Egyptian and Egyptianizing scarabs: a typology of steatite, faience, and paste scarabs from Punic and other Mediterranean sites, Oxford.
